statements: SELECT * FROM bootcamp_students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM bootcamp_students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT student_name, course_enrolled FROM bootcamp_students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM bootcamp_students ORDER BY student_age DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_enrolled FROM bootcamp_students WHERE student_age < 25 ORDER BY student_age ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM bootcamp_students WHERE student_age > 25 ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT * FROM bootcamp_students WHERE course_enrolled = 'Web Development' AND student_age < 30
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM bootcamp_students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2021-01-01' AND enrollment_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC
SELECT student_name, student_age, course_enrolled FROM bootcamp_students WHERE course_enrolled LIKE '%Data%' AND student_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY student_age ASC, student_name DESC
SELECT DISTINCT course_enrolled FROM bootcamp_students ORDER BY course_enrolled ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM bootcamp_students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM bootcamp_students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM bootcamp_students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM bootcamp_courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM bootcamp_courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM bootcamp_students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM bootcamp_students WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT student_name, course_name, instructor_name FROM bootcamp_students JOIN bootcamp_courses ON bootcamp_students.student_id = bootcamp_courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM bootcamp_students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS total_students, COUNT(DISTINCT enrollment_date) AS total_enrollment_dates FROM bootcamp_students;
SELECT * FROM bootcamp_students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM bootcamp_students WHERE age > 25;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM bootcamp_courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT student_name, email, course_name FROM bootcamp_students JOIN bootcamp_enrollments ON bootcamp_students.student_id = bootcamp_enrollments.student_id JOIN bootcamp_courses ON bootcamp_enrollments.course_id = bootcamp_courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, cohort_id FROM bootcamp_students WHERE cohort_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM bootcamp_students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, start_date, end_date FROM bootcamp_courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT student_id, student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM bootcamp_students JOIN bootcamp_enrollments ON bootcamp_students.student_id = bootcamp_enrollments.student_id JOIN bootcamp_courses ON bootcamp_enrollments.course_id = bootcamp_courses.course_id WHERE age >= 25;
SELECT student_name, email, cohort_id FROM bootcamp_students WHERE cohort_id IS NULL;

SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM bootcamp_students JOIN bootcamp_enrollments ON bootcamp_students.student_id = bootcamp_enrollments.student_id JOIN bootcamp_courses ON bootcamp_enrollments.course_id = bootcamp_courses.course_id WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Bootcamp_Students;
SELECT student_name, enrolled_date FROM Bootcamp_Students WHERE batch_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Bootcamp_Courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Bootcamp_Students JOIN Bootcamp_Enrollments ON Bootcamp_Students.student_id = Bootcamp_Enrollments.student_id;
SELECT query_id, query_text, execution_date FROM Bootcamp_Queries WHERE execution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Bootcamp_Students WHERE batch_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrolled_date FROM Bootcamp_Students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Bootcamp_Courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Bootcamp_Students JOIN Bootcamp_Enrollments ON Bootcamp_Students.student_id = Bootcamp_Enrollments.student_id JOIN Bootcamp_Courses ON Bootcamp_Enrollments.course_id = Bootcamp_Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Bootcamp_Enrollments WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM bootcamp_students;
SELECT student_name, start_date FROM bootcamp_students ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, duration FROM bootcamp_courses WHERE duration > 30;
SELECT specialty, instructor_name FROM bootcamp_instructors WHERE specialty = 'Data Science';
SELECT assignment_name, deadline FROM bootcamp_assignments WHERE deadline >= '2022-12-15';
SELECT student_name, start_date FROM bootcamp_students
SELECT course_name, duration FROM bootcamp_courses
SELECT instructor_name, specialty FROM bootcamp_instructors
SELECT assignment_name, deadline FROM bootcamp_assignments
SELECT student_name, grade FROM bootcamp_students JOIN bootcamp_grades ON bootcamp_students.student_id = bootcamp_grades.student_id
